thread.title: Mad Soul Child To Release Song Inspired By The Last Wolverine Film “Logan”
thread.title_full: Mad Soul Child To Release Song Inspired By The Last Wolverine Film “Logan”

author: choralee
title: Mad Soul Child To Release Song Inspired By The Last Wolverine Film “Logan”
text:
Mad Soul Child will be singing a new song for the last Wolverine movie. 
The film “Logan” has been receiving a positive response after it premiered at the 67th Berlin International Film Festival, and now Mad Soul Child will be releasing a live video for their new song “Get Back,” which was inspired by the film. 
Mad Soul Child, who has a reputation for collaborating with artists like Dynamic Duo, Mad Clown, and Tablo, will be releasing the track on February 22 through their social media site as well as the YouTube channel 1thK. 
Mad Soul Child’s Jinsil talked about the song, saying, “I wrote the song after I saw the trailer for ‘Logan.’ I was impressed by the atmosphere because it was so different from previous hero films. I hope everyone thinks of the song as a tribute to the last wolverine, Logan.” 
Meanwhile, Hugh Jackman’s film “Logan” is set to air in Korean theaters on February 28.
